citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am-12:00pm
on 2/17/2021. The Inspector honked the vehicle horn by the house and the shop. Called the number on file and left a
message and waited 30 minutes before leaving the premise.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am-12:00pm 
on 2/17/2021. The Inspector honked the vehicle horn by the house and the shop.  Called the number on file and left a 
message and waited 30 minutes before leaving the premise. 
 
 
 
End Section
